ValidationRule.description: Users cannot change the Date on a Project Delivery Schedule Item if it has already passed. Excludes Business Optimization Role, and the following users: Becki Johnson, Rachel Eckert and Anthony Yanez.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Date__c) && PRIORVALUE(Date__c ) < TODAY() && $UserRole.Name <> "Business Optimization" && $User.Id <> '00530000003biB7' /*Rebecca Johnson*/ && $User.Id <> '0055Y00000INeH1' /*Rachel Eckert*/ && $User.Id <> '00530000003A32G' /*Anthony Yanez*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change past Date. Submit request to salesforce@erepublic.com
